name: New Generation Health Center Clinic Services
description: New Generation Health Center provides confidential, youth-friendly reproductive health services. All services are designed with the needs of young people in mind. They offer: - Pregnancy testing and options counseling - Emergency Contraception – "The Morning After Pill" - Birth control counseling and dispensing - Condom dispensing - STD testing and treatment - HIV testing and counseling - Pap smears and pelvic exams - Testicular exams - Health information Note: They cannot provide prenatal ser

howToGetIt: Accept FamilyPACT and Medi-Cal to cover the cost of services. To find out if you qualify for either of these programs, please visit http://www.familypact.org and https://www.coveredca.com/medi-cal/. They do not accept private insurance. If you have any questions about cost or eligibility, please call (415) 502-8336.
